file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 34-26-03-07 - SINGLE IRU FAN - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SINGLE IRU FAN - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SINGLE IRS 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to clean the filter of the Single Inertial-Reference-Unit (IRU) fan. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH SIN- SINGLE IRU MOUNTING TRAY FAN FIL- 34-26-03-100-801-A ♦ GLE IRS TER - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 34-26-03 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-26-03-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SINGLE IRS 2. SINGLE IRU MOUNTING TRAY FAN FILTER - CLEANING A. General (1) The Single IRU fan is installed at the rear of the IRU mounting tray, in the forward electronic compartment. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL AMM TASK 34-26-01-000-801-A/400 INERTIAL REFERENCE UNIT (IRU) - REMOVAL AMM TASK 34-26-01-400-801-A/400 INERTIAL REFERENCE UNIT (IRU) - INSTALLATION SB145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Forward electronic compartment - LH 213 113CZ upper side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On aircraft PRE-MOD SB145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) On aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, install the safety pin of the NLG-door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 34-26-03 Page 2 of 4 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) On the circuit breaker panel, open the IRS circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (4) Open the 113CZ panel to get access to the Single IRU fan. (5) Remove the Inertial Reference Unit ( AMM TASK 34-26-01-000-801-A/400). J. Clean Single IRU Mounting Tray Fan Filter (Figure 701) SUBTASK 140-002-A (1) Hold and click out the cover of the fan filter to remove it from the fan case. (2) Clean the spongy filter with dry compressed air. NOTE: If necessary, replace the filter. (3) Position the cleaned filter in the fan case. (4) Push in the filter to install it in the fan case. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the Inertial Reference Unit ( AMM TASK 34-26-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Close access panel 113CZ. (3) On aircraft POST-MOD SB145-32-0036, remove the safety pin of the NLG-door solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (4) On the circuit breaker panel, close the IRS circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it.
